project1.title: Chatterbox
project1.description: A chat site with a message log with editable messages.  Includes multiple color themes, emoji commands, a gif selector utilizing the Giphy API, and multiple chatbots that can respond to each other.  The site was built as part of a group project with myself personally being responsible for building the message log structure and edit and delete message functions.  I also built the user selection, chatbots, gif selector, emoji support, and for our friends in the land down under - the Austrailian mode. Select the links below for additional information on specific components.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript w/ modules, Git/Github, Bootstrap

project2.title: Pathetic Connect
project2.description: A personal dashboard site using Google authentication and Firebase database access.  Built as a group project, I was personally responsible for building the friends functionality for the site and integrating it with the other components.  Users can use their friends tab to view a list of other users they are currently friends with, send friend requests to other users, and view and accept/decline pending requests.  I also added an avatar component allowing users to select an avatar from a list of existing images hosted through firebase storage, or upload their own image to use.  Select the links below for additional information on specific components.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, JS, JQuery, Webpack, Firebase, Axios, Bootstrap
